short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to remove the clutter from LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension to keep LinkedIn clean from clutter. 

It enables serious users to  get original content from authors that they connect or follow. Basically it removes any comments, likes, emotions or promoted content.
